LanguageData.BAW_Nodoka.label: Sagittarius Night
LanguageData.BAW_Nodoka.description: A submachine gun that Nodoka carries with her when she goes out for astronomical observations.\n\nAttached flashlight illuminates the dark night road brightly.
LanguageData.BAW_Nodoka.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Nodoka.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Nodoka.label: Bullet of Sagittarius Night
